description: This file defines the DashboardScreen widget for a Flutter app, which manages the main dashboard with tabs showing recent transactions and analytics. It handles authentication state, data fetching, and navigation actions.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Main widget representing the user dashboard with tabs for recent transactions and analytics.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the dashboard's internal logic, including tab controller, data fetching, and navigation.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the tab controller and fetches data on authentication.

methods.name: _fetchOnAuth
methods.description: Fetches transactions when the user is authenticated.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the dashboard screen including app bar, tabs, and floating action button.
